column5: Hi all,  Met up again with a guy up from Omaha who is staying at a local camp. This time he showed me a spot he knows. THANKS DAN! great spot, non stop slab crappie. 1/8th Oz jig with twister tail or minnow cast in by itself or under a slip bobber. Really shallow now, not more than 18" deep.

Dude , you need your own fishing show! You videos are always amazing. Every time I see you post something I can't wait to watch the video, you always do an amazing job. Those were some nice slabs that's for sure!
Man I love your videos and you have a way with words.  - Another chunky monkey - A slab-a-roonie - Slimerrrr
Watched it this morning, awesome stuff!  Love that they aren't shy to hit a walleye jig, while the guys down south are finessing with tiny jigs and 2 lb test
Great video Simon!  Geez my PB was 14.5" from big sawbill, that was almost your average hahahahaha  Talk about non stop action!  Joey, that's pretty par up here for crappie.
Limeyangler, What size of Twister Tail are you using?
Awesome Simon as usual! These videos are a real treat!
That's amazing.. We don't have spots like that in my area anymore.. sadly.. I love fishing shallow wood for crappie.. They just stack up and hang out..
